T02D1692:46a-1: a'arya t'a ra sragdha ra sto tra /
T02D1692:46a-3: 'phags ma sgrol ma'i me tog phreng ba 'dzin pa'i bstod pa /
T02D1692:46a-4: rje btsun ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1692:46a-5: sngar shar nyi ma snang ba dmar //
T02D1692:46a-6: lha mchog spyi gtsug nor bu dmar //
T02D1692:46a-7: de 'byar kha dog de la ni //
T02D1692:46a-8: tshos sar gyis ni bskus pa 'dra //
T02D1692:46a-9: 'phags ma khyed kyi zhabs gnyis la //
T02D1692:46a-10: gus pa'i tha la mo dbu rgyan gyis //
T02D1692:46a-11: de mdzes mgo yis phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1692:46a-12: nyes byung dus su bskyab bam //
T02D1692:46a-13: de ni sgrol ma khyed yin no //
T02D1692:46a-14: bstod gsar me tog phreng ba 'dis //
T02D1692:46a-15: mchod la bdag gis phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1692:46a-16: rgal mi nus pa'i sdug bsngal me //
T02D1692:46a-17: de la rtag tu lus lhung gnas //
T02D1692:46a-18: skal ba ma ldan 'gro sa gang //
T02D1692:46a-19: rmongs pa bdag gis ji ltar bya //
T02D1692:46a-20: de ltar rtag tu smras nas ni //
T02D1692:46a-21: don med bdag ni stobs chung song //
T02D1692:46a-22: mkha' la nyi zla dpal ldan grags //
T02D1692:46a-23: de ni gzhan gyi smra ba thos //
T02D1692:46a-24: de thos long ba'i spyod pa ltar //
T02D1692:46a-25: mthong rten 'dod kyang gzhan khrid med //
T02D1692:46a-26: sdig pa 'joms ma khyed la ni //
T02D1692:46a-27: bdag ni skyabs mthong 'dod lags so //
T02D1692:46a-28: sems can thams cad sgrol ba'i phyir //
T02D1692:46a-29: de la snying rje mi mdzad dam //
T02D1692:46a-30: ma lus par ni snying rje mdzad //
T02D1692:46a-31: de khongs bdag lta yod gyur na //
T02D1692:46a-32: khong la snying rje mdzad pa bzhin //
T02D1692:46a-33: bdag la de bzhin mdzad 'tshal lo //
T02D1692:46a-34: nus pa med pas mi mdzad dam //
T02D1692:46a-35: khyed bzhin nus la gnyis pa med //
T02D1692:46a-36: 'gro ba rnams kyi sdig mun pa //
T02D1692:46a-38: de ltar yin kyang sdug pa bdag / mi dge las ni ma tshig pas //
T02D1692:46a-39: ngan las byas pas bdag ni 'gyod //
T02D1692:46a-40: skal ngan bdag la skal ba med //
T02D1692:46a-41: nyi ma shar yang mun pa gnag / gangg'a'i chu ni shin tu bsil //
T02D1692:46a-42: de phyir 'gram du bsdad kyang ni //
T02D1692:46a-43: skom yang btud rgyu ma rnyed do //
T02D1692:46b-0: rin chen sna tshogs @46b yod pa'i gling //
T02D1692:46b-1: nor rnams kyis gang khang pa la //
T02D1692:46b-2: der 'dug kyang ni bdag phongs pas //
T02D1692:46b-3: bcom ldan 'das ma khyed la ni //
T02D1692:46b-4: mgon 'dod kyang ni mgon med bdag /'jig rten kun gyi yum gcig ma //
T02D1692:46b-5: ma la rtag tu dus nas ni //
T02D1692:46b-6: nu ma'i don du bu slong na //
T02D1692:46b-7: de la ma yang skyo bar 'gyur //
T02D1692:46b-8: mi rnyed nyin re slong gyur na //
T02D1692:46b-9: pha yang bu la khro bar byed //
T02D1692:46b-10: 'jig rten gsum gyis bslangs kyang ni //
T02D1692:46b-11: khyed kyis 'bras bu gang bar byas //
T02D1692:46b-12: dpag bsam shing gi yal ga mchog / de ni sgrol ma khyed yin no //
T02D1692:46b-13: thams cad la ni ma lus pa //
T02D1692:46b-14: sbyin pa khyod kyis khyab bar byas //
T02D1692:46b-15: nyon mongs kun gyi me des ni //
T02D1692:46b-16: bdag gi lus 'di rtag tu tshig / sa 'og sdug bsngal de la ni //
T02D1692:46b-17: bdag gi lus 'di nub tsam na //
T02D1692:46b-18: sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal ni //
T02D1692:46b-19: drag po 'phel bar gyur tsam na //
T02D1692:46b-20: khyod kyis dam bcas zhal bzhes pa //
T02D1692:46b-21: bdag gi steng du grub bar mdzod //
T02D1692:46b-22: rdzogs sangs rgyas pa'i smon lam ni //
T02D1692:46b-23: bdag gi sems la shar ba'i dus //
T02D1692:46b-24: sgrol ma phan 'dogs mdzad par zhu //
T02D1692:46b-25: lag bsgreng bstod pa'i tshig brjod cing //
T02D1692:46b-26: don du drag por dus pa yis //
T02D1692:46b-27: gzhan la zhus kyang don 'grub bo //
T02D1692:46b-28: khyed lta bu la bdag gis zhus //
T02D1692:46b-29: kye ma sgrol ma khyed kyis ni //
T02D1692:46b-30: bdag spangs par ni mi gsha'o //
T02D1692:46b-31: khyod kyi spyan gyis gzigs tsam na //
T02D1692:46b-33: mi bde mi bzod sdug bsngal ni //
T02D1692:46b-35: bdag ni sdig can yin gyur na ;
T02D1692:46b-36: / dad pa shin tu 'phel nas ni //
T02D1692:46b-37: khyed la dad pa skye mi gsha' //
T02D1692:46b-38: ming thos pa'am dran pa yis //
T02D1692:46b-39: khyed kyi sdig pa dbang med 'phrog / bdag don khyed kyis spangs ba de //
T02D1692:46b-40: bden par bdag la gsung bar zhu //
T02D1692:46b-41: khyed ni bden par gsung ldan ma //
T02D1692:46b-42: snying rje che ba'i sman pa yis //
T02D1692:46b-43: nad pa ma shi bar du ni //
T02D1692:46b-44: sman gyis phan 'dod che ru byed //
T02D1692:46b-45: sgyu ma ser sna nga rgyal sogs //
T02D1692:46b-46: ngan pa de rnams kyis khyir nas //
T02D1692:46b-47: ri mos khyer bas dal skabs med //
T02D1692:46b-48: gnas pa'i spyi nor rnga mo bzhin //
T02D1692:46b-49: skad cig dal ba med pas ni //
T02D1692:47a-0: @47a * // bdag gis mchod skabs ma rnyed do //
T02D1692:47a-1: des ni yi ge du tshig 'don //
T02D1692:47a-2: de bton pas ni phan 'dogs re //
T02D1692:47a-3: dus mtha' rlung gis g-yas su 'khyil //
T02D1692:47a-4: des ni gtsubs pa'i chu rlabs 'byung //
T02D1692:47a-5: g-yo zhing 'gul ba'i rol pas 'khrug / de rgyab dpa' rlabs 'gram du ni //
T02D1692:47a-6: brdabs pas sgra grag skad gdangs can //
T02D1692:47a-7: 'jigs byed rgya mtsho de las ni //
T02D1692:47a-8: gru chag nub pa'i skabs de la //
T02D1692:47a-9: snying rje du skad drag po bton //
T02D1692:47a-10: skad cig dran med bems por gyur //
T02D1692:47a-11: lha mo khyod la bstod pa yis //
T02D1692:47a-12: bde bar rgya mtsho phar bsgral lo //
T02D1692:47a-13: sprin nag bskor zhing du ba'i nang //
T02D1692:47a-14: de la me stag can gyi me //
T02D1692:47a-15: me lce cher 'bar khyim du ni //
T02D1692:47a-16: ngal nas mal du nyal ba'i mis //
T02D1692:47a-17: khyed la rab btung thal mo sbyar //
T02D1692:47a-18: skad cig gis ni glog byung nas //
T02D1692:47a-19: myur bar sprin char gyis ni bskor //
T02D1692:47a-20: smyo byed glang chen 'gram gnyis la ;
T02D1692:47a-21: /'dzag pa'i chu la reg nas ni //
T02D1692:47a-22: bung ba'i phreng ba bzhin du thal //
T02D1692:47a-23: de rnams kyis ni h'um sgra sgrogs //
T02D1692:47a-24: sgra de thos nas zhe sdang las //
T02D1692:47a-25: glang chen 'thab tu byung mno nas //
T02D1692:47a-26: khros nas mche bas mi btag nas //
T02D1692:47a-27: 'do li la ni bsdad pa bzhin //
T02D1692:47a-28: khyed dran tsam gyis 'chi ba bzlog / pha rol rgal nas rin chen rnyed //
T02D1692:47a-29: de steng mkhar du bsdad du phyin //
T02D1692:47a-30: mi med stong pa nags gseb tu //
T02D1692:47a-31: shin tu rno ba'i mtshon rnams kyis //
T02D1692:47a-32: brgyab nas yod par mi ro'i mgo / tri sh'u la la bsad ro mang //
T02D1692:47a-33: de 'dra nags gseb phyin tsa na //
T02D1692:47a-34: ral gri phub dag bzung nas ni //
T02D1692:47a-35: mda' gzhu bkang nas byung ba rnams //
T02D1692:47a-36: zur mig lta zhing khros nas byung //
T02D1692:47a-37: rgol nas brdeg tu byung tsam na //
T02D1692:47a-38: khyed bsams skyo med smyu gus bris //
T02D1692:47a-39: khyed ming gsal por bris ma thag / dpal ldan khyim du bsdad phyin no //
T02D1692:47a-40: rkang pa'i sor mo rab rno pa ;
T02D1692:47a-41: / rdo rje lta bus rab tu brkos //
T02D1692:47a-42: smyo byed glang chen mgo khrag byung //
T02D1692:47a-43: 'jigs byed seng ge byung tsam na //
T02D1692:47a-44: khyod bos bstod pa brjod pa yis //
T02D1692:47a-45: bred nas seng ge log nas thal //
T02D1692:47b-0: rtag tu @47b phug byed kha gdangs pa //
T02D1692:47b-1: lce chen ston pa sbrul khro ba //
T02D1692:47b-2: gshin rje'i zhags pas bkyigs pa'i mi //
T02D1692:47b-3: sdig pa'i dbang gis de ltar byung //
T02D1692:47b-4: de dus khyed kyi yon tan bsgrags //
T02D1692:47b-5: gus pas dad par khyed la byas //
T02D1692:47b-6: sprul de autpala phreng bar gyur //
T02D1692:47b-7: me tog mchod pa'i mi des thob ;
T02D1692:47b-8: / dpon gyis mig mtshams 'gul dogs kyis //
T02D1692:47b-9: der bred dmag dpon rim pa yis //
T02D1692:47b-10: thag pas bkyigs nas skra nas drud //
T02D1692:47b-11: rtsub mos bkal nas khrid tsam na //
T02D1692:47b-12: khol po de ni na tsha che //
T02D1692:47b-13: ca co smra ba gtong 'dod nas //
T02D1692:47b-14: nye ba gnyen rnams kyis ni bor //
T02D1692:47b-15: ltogs nas skom nas mchu skams pa //
T02D1692:47b-16: sdug bsngal mtha' med byung tsam na //
T02D1692:47b-17: gang gis sgrol ma'i zhabs la skyabs //
T02D1692:47b-18: skad cig gis ni grol nas thar //
T02D1692:47b-19: sgyu ma byas pa'i gzugs mi legs //
T02D1692:47b-20: mi ro'i rgyu ma bus pa des //
T02D1692:47b-21: phreng ba mang bas ske la btags //
T02D1692:47b-22: sus kyang dgag tu mi nus pa //
T02D1692:47b-23: de byung dus su khyod kyi sngags //
T02D1692:47b-24: brjod pa tsam gyis sdig pa dag / srin po'i dran pa med tsam na //
T02D1692:47b-25: de rnams kyis ni srung bar byed //
T02D1692:47b-26: 'brug byung ba yi sprin gyi gzugs //
T02D1692:47b-27: nga rgyal 'jigs pa rtsang po gsum //
T02D1692:47b-28: de ni mun pa gnag pa la ;
T02D1692:47b-29: glog bzhin mtshon cha snang ba yis //
T02D1692:47b-30: mda' yi char pa byung tsam na //
T02D1692:47b-31: 'thab pa'i dus su bskor nas bkag / shin tu stobs chen dgra rnams kyis //
T02D1692:47b-32: khro zhing brdeg tu byung tsam na //
T02D1692:47b-33: sgrol ma khyed kyis stobs byin pas //
T02D1692:47b-34: dpa' bo gcig gis de rnams bcom //
T02D1692:47b-35: sa ris rnams ni rang dbang byas //
T02D1692:47b-36: sdig pas gang ba mdze pho'i gzugs //
T02D1692:47b-37: lus po skrangs nas khrag rnag dang //
T02D1692:47b-38: chu ser de rnams 'dzag pa ni //
T02D1692:47b-39: rtsa sha pags pa phug pa nas //
T02D1692:47b-40: 'bu rnams kyis ni zos pa na //
T02D1692:47b-41: sgrol ma khyed kyi zhabs brten nas //
T02D1692:47b-42: rtag tu khyed la mos gus byas //
T02D1692:47b-43: mos gus da rang sman du gyur //
T02D1692:47b-44: gser gyi kha dog lus gyur nas //
T02D1692:47b-45: padma dkar po rgyas pa'i spyan //
T02D1692:47b-46: des ni gzugs bzang lus thob bo //
T02D1692:47b-47: slob dpon rnams kyi bka' de la //
T02D1692:47b-48: rna ba snod du ma rung bas //
T02D1692:47b-49: thos pa'i nor ni phongs par 'gyur //
T02D1692:48a-2: khyod la los gus bstod bgyis pas //
T02D1692:48a-3: gsung ldan seng khri 'phrog par byed //
T02D1692:48a-4: de 'phrogs pa yang rgyal po'i mdun //
T02D1692:48a-5: rgyan cha sna tshogs btags nas ni //
T02D1692:48a-6: gsung gi dbang phyug seng khri sdod //
T02D1692:48a-7: sa la nyal bas rdul mas khengs //
T02D1692:48a-8: lus kyi kha dog du bar gyur //
T02D1692:48a-9: dug po gos kyis lus ma khyab //
T02D1692:48a-10: rtag tu shig dang sro ma gsed //
T02D1692:48a-11: gzhan gyi mdun du phor gog 'dzin //
T02D1692:48a-12: rtag tu slong mo byed pa de //
T02D1692:48a-13: sgrol ma khyed la skyabs tsam na //
T02D1692:48a-14: nges par mdzes ma dgod nas ni //
T02D1692:48a-15: rnga yab mdzes pas g-yob par byed //
T02D1692:48a-16: stobs chen glang po che rnams kyis //
T02D1692:48a-17: bdag por gyur nas gdugs gcig pa //
T02D1692:48a-18: ras ris tsam gyis rgyal por gyur //
T02D1692:48a-19: gzhan g-yog las dang yon tan dang //
T02D1692:48a-20: tshong dang thabs kyis nor tshol ba //
T02D1692:48a-21: tshe snga ma yis dge ba'i nor //
T02D1692:48a-22: ji ltar byas kyang nor med pa //
T02D1692:48a-23: su la bslangs kyang rnyed pa med //
T02D1692:48a-24: kye ma khyed la bslangs tsam na //
T02D1692:48a-25: sa gseb tu ni nor rnyed nas //
T02D1692:48a-26: mi de phyug por gyur par byung //
T02D1692:48a-27: 'tsho ba med pas ngo tsha che //
T02D1692:48a-28: gos med pas ni chung mas brgal //
T02D1692:48a-29: phongs pa yin pas gnyen gyis bor //
T02D1692:48a-30: ster dgos mno nas thag rings su ;
T02D1692:48a-31: / kye ma sgrol ma khyed la ni //
T02D1692:48a-32: rang gi sdug bsngal bstan tsam na //
T02D1692:48a-33: rta rnams rmig pa sa la rko //
T02D1692:48a-34: de brkos sa yang khyim bskor nas //
T02D1692:48a-35: rang yid 'ong pa rgyal po'i khab //
T02D1692:48a-36: khyim der gnyid ni log pa las //
T02D1692:48a-37: mdzes ma rnams kyis lag brgyan grags //
T02D1692:48a-38: des ni gnyid log sad pa rnyed //
T02D1692:48a-39: phyogs bcur gyur pa'i 'khor lo ni //
T02D1692:48a-40: shin tu 'od zer ldan pa dang //
T02D1692:48a-41: mtshan nyid ldan pa'i bud med dang //
T02D1692:48a-42: mche ba drug yod glang po che //
T02D1692:48a-43: rma bya'i ske yi kha dog ldan //
T02D1692:48a-44: de ltar sdo ba rta bzang dang //
T02D1692:48a-45: rin po che ni nyi ma'i 'od //
T02D1692:48a-46: dri ma med pa'i gter gyis bkang //
T02D1692:48a-47: dmag gi dpa' bo mang ba dang //
T02D1692:48a-48: sgrol ma khyed kyi bka' drin gyis //
T02D1692:48a-49: 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur //
T02D1692:48a-50: ma la ya yi ldum ra ru //
T02D1692:48a-51: nor bu rin po che yi rdo //
T02D1692:48a-52: de la tsandan la sogs bskus //
T02D1692:48a-53: lha mo rnams kyang 'tshog sa byas //
T02D1692:48b-0: 'gron sar mchod pa byas pa @48b bzhin ;
T02D1692:48b-1: / shin tu chags nas rtsed mo rtses //
T02D1692:48b-2: sgrol ma khyed kyi rig pa grub //
T02D1692:48b-3: rig ba 'dzin pa'i lha dbang po'i //
T02D1692:48b-4: ral gri 'od zer ljang gus ni //
T02D1692:48b-5: lag pa zangs de la phrog pa de //
T02D1692:48b-6: yang nas yang du gsor byed pa //
T02D1692:48b-7: gzugs bzang lha ni thob par 'gyur //
T02D1692:48b-8: mu tig phreng bas mdzes par btags //
T02D1692:48b-9: de btags nu ma'i bar du byung //
T02D1692:48b-10: rna bar autpala btags pa de //
T02D1692:48b-12: thor tshugs manda ra ba btags //
T02D1692:48b-13: dri zhim bung bas bor ma nus //
T02D1692:48b-14: rked par g-yer kha mdzes par btags //
T02D1692:48b-15: zhabs gnyis legs pa de la ni ;
T02D1692:48b-16: / sil sil sgra dang g-yer kha btags //
T02D1692:48b-17: sgrol ma khyed la brlab tsam na //
T02D1692:48b-18: 'dod pa'i lha la dga' ba tsam //
T02D1692:48b-19: de phrad lha mo bsnyen bkur byed //
T02D1692:48b-20: rdzing 'gram rin po che yis bskor //
T02D1692:48b-21: gser gyi padma de la ni //
T02D1692:48b-22: ge sar rdo rje pha lam 'bar //
T02D1692:48b-23: pa ra dza' ga'i shing de ni //
T02D1692:48b-24: cung zad bkug pa dri zhim dmar //
T02D1692:48b-25: de nas bla re bzhin du khyab //
T02D1692:48b-26: tam bu ra dang rnga la sogs //
T02D1692:48b-27: lha rnams kyis ni snyan par bsgrags //
T02D1692:48b-28: sgrol ma khyod kyi bka' drin gyis //
T02D1692:48b-29: lha yi ldum rar yun rings rtses //
T02D1692:48b-30: bde ba shin tu nyams su myong //
T02D1692:48b-31: ga bur dang ni ka ko la //
T02D1692:48b-32: aa ka ru dang spos dang dri //
T02D1692:48b-33: de rnams btags nas chur bsres pas //
T02D1692:48b-34: dri zhim chu rnams kyis ni brdeg / lha mo'i nu ma gnyis kyi bar //
T02D1692:48b-35: lha yi gtsang po chu mgyogs des //
T02D1692:48b-36: phar rdeg tshur rdeg rtsed mo byed //
T02D1692:48b-37: lha mo mdzes pa de rnams dang //
T02D1692:48b-38: khyod kyi bka' drin bsod nams kyis //
T02D1692:48b-39: lha yul du ni rtsed mo myong //
T02D1692:48b-40: mtho ris gnas pa'i lha rnams kyis //
T02D1692:48b-41: gus pas bka' ni spyi bos len //
T02D1692:48b-42: de lan phyag ni byas nas su //
T02D1692:48b-43: glang po che la zhon pa la //
T02D1692:48b-44: rgyan cha btags pa'i glang rdzi des //
T02D1692:48b-45: lag pa gnyis la gdu bu btags //
T02D1692:48b-46: des ni 'do le bsgyings tsam na //
T02D1692:48b-47: bkag mi nus pa ba spu ldang //
T02D1692:48b-48: rdo rje pha lam lag rgyan btags //
T02D1692:48b-49: khyed kyi spyan gyis gzigs tsam na //
T02D1692:48b-50: lha yi dbang po brgya byin thob //
T02D1692:48b-51: lha yi ris kyis srung bar byed //
T02D1692:48b-52: sangs rgyas bstan ba de la ni //
T02D1692:48b-53: rin chen me tog spyi bor gnas //
T02D1692:49a-0: @49a * // nam mkha' dpal gyi bla res khyab //
T02D1692:49a-2: des ni 'jig rten gsum po bkang //
T02D1692:49a-3: g-yon bskum g-yas brkyang zhabs gcig gis //
T02D1692:49a-4: de mnan bkug pa tshangs pa dang //
T02D1692:49a-5: dbang phyug chen po khyab 'jug go //
T02D1692:49a-6: khyed kyi sku ni bsgom bgyis pas //
T02D1692:49a-8: skye ba len pa chad nas yod //
T02D1692:49a-9: kha cig gis ni 'di ltar mthong //
T02D1692:49a-10: nags tshal phyag gi mtshon chas bzung //
T02D1692:49a-11: shin tu 'jigs pa stobs po che //
T02D1692:49a-12: nam mkha' khyab par lag gdu bu //
T02D1692:49a-13: de rnams 'jigs che sbrul du mthong //
T02D1692:49a-14: kye ma'o khros nas skrag par byed //
T02D1692:49a-15: dgod pa'i sgra ni shin tu 'jigs //
T02D1692:49a-16: ma rungs pa yi spyod pa byed //
T02D1692:49a-17: ro langs ting ting shag ni brdung //
T02D1692:49a-18: 'jigs chen rtsed mo sgra chen bsgrags //
T02D1692:49a-19: kha cig gis ni mthong ba la //
T02D1692:49a-20: sgrol ma'i ba spu re re las //
T02D1692:49a-22: bde bar gnas pa'i tshangs pa dang //
T02D1692:49a-23: lha yi dbang po brgya byin dang //
T02D1692:49a-24: dbang phyug chen po klu la sogs //
T02D1692:49a-25: lha dang mi dang grub thob dang //
T02D1692:49a-26: dri za gnod sbyin sbrul rnams dang //
T02D1692:49a-27: phyogs su rgyu ba'i 'khor lo yang //
T02D1692:49a-28: tha med bde gshegs khyim der gnas //
T02D1692:49a-29: kye ma rab tu rdzu 'phrul che //
T02D1692:49a-30: 'jig rten gsum gyis phyag byas pa //
T02D1692:49a-32: sna tshogs lhag med dngos po ni //
T02D1692:49a-33: kye ma sgrol ma khyed yin no //
T02D1692:49a-34: kha cig gis ni mthong ba la //
T02D1692:49a-35: rgya skyegs dang ni sindhu ra //
T02D1692:49a-36: dkar dmar kha dog nyi ma ltar //
T02D1692:49a-38: kha cig gis ni mthong ba la //
T02D1692:49a-40: kha cig gis ni gser 'dra mdog / khyod kyi gzugs ni sna tshogs mthong //
T02D1692:49a-42: ye shes mang me thams cad mkhyen //
T02D1692:49a-43: des ni thams cad gsal bar mthong //
T02D1692:49a-44: de nyid mkhyen pa dbang po gcig / nges par khyod kyi yon tan ni //
T02D1692:49a-45: grangs las thams cad mkhyen pas shes //
T02D1692:49a-46: yang na de yi sras kyis mkhyen //
T02D1692:49a-47: bdag gis kha gdangs byas nas ni //
T02D1692:49a-48: bya rog kha 'dra'i sgra dang ni //
T02D1692:49b-0: sdug bsngal tshad pas khyab @49b tsam na //
T02D1692:49b-1: de skyes na tsha byung tsam na //
T02D1692:49b-2: bdag gis pho rog smra bzhin bton //
T02D1692:49b-3: gzhan gyi sems la bzhad gad rgyu //
T02D1692:49b-4: bdag gis zhus pa'i don du ni //
T02D1692:49b-5: ma zhus gong du lhag par mkhyen //
T02D1692:49b-6: khyod kyi mkhyen pa de la ni //
T02D1692:49b-7: bdag gis zhus pa don med gleng //
T02D1692:49b-8: 'on kyang rang sems dga' ba'i don //
T02D1692:49b-9: nye ba'i gnyen gyi mdun du ni //
T02D1692:49b-10: dug dag skyugs pa smras pa bzhin //
T02D1692:49b-11: sdug bsngal don de shes kyang ni //
T02D1692:49b-12: rang snying yang zhing bde ba bzhin //
T02D1692:49b-13: phan 'dogs dga' ba rgya mtsho nyid //
T02D1692:49b-14: rab tu gsal ba zla ba'i cha //
T02D1692:49b-15: kye ma mdzes mas gzigs par zhu ;
T02D1692:49b-16: / gdams ngag ye shes gnang bar zhu //
T02D1692:49b-17: snying rje chen mo khyod nyid kyis //
T02D1692:49b-18: mun nag sems ni gsal bar mdzod //
T02D1692:49b-19: khyed kyi bstod pa'i chu des ni //
T02D1692:49b-20: bdag gi sems ni gtsang bar bkrus //
T02D1692:49b-21: phan nas byungs gcig rnyed do //
T02D1692:49b-23: 'bras bu thob pa yod par mthong //
T02D1692:49b-24: rab tu bstod pa'i yon tan cha //
T02D1692:49b-25: bdag gis bsod nams bshad mi shes //
T02D1692:49b-26: bsod nams de yi stobs kyis ni //
T02D1692:49b-28: grol ba'i bde ba myong bar shog / spyan ras gzigs kyi zhabs kyi mthil //
T02D1692:49b-29: de yi mtshan ma bkra shis kyis //
T02D1692:49b-30: de bkang yod pa de la ni //
T02D1692:49b-31: bde gshegs sras kyi sa ris yin //
T02D1692:49b-32: bde nas bde ru 'gro ba kun //
T02D1692:49b-33: myur bar song nas bde bar shog / me tog
T02D1692:49b-34: phreng ba 'dzin pa'i bstod pa slob dpon thams cad
T02D1692:49b-35: mkhyen pa'i bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
